snippet.title: Sonic Adventure DX (HD) playthrough ~Longplay~
snippet.description:
This is a playthrough of Sonic Adventure DX (HD) for the Xbox 360 (timestamps below).

Good ol' SA1. Beautifully jank, but I wouldn't have it any other way. What a great game.

0:00:00 Opening

0:02:35 SONIC Story Begins
0:04:20 Boss: Chaos 0
0:06:28 Emerald Coast
0:11:22 Boss: Egg Hornet
0:14:33 Windy Valley
0:19:15 Casinopolis
0:28:12 Icecap
0:32:41 Boss: Knuckles
0:34:24 Boss: Chaos 4
0:39:09 Sky Chase Act 1
0:45:03 Twinkle Park
0:49:42 Speed Highway
0:55:23 Red Mountain
0:59:52 Sky Chase Act 2
1:05:27 Sky Deck
1:11:15 Boss: E-102 γ
1:14:43 Boss: Chaos 6
1:17:58 Lost World
1:26:51 Final Egg
1:32:19 Boss: Egg Viper
1:36:34 Credits: It Doesn’t Matter

1:41:17 TAILS Story Begins
1:45:08 Boss: Egg Hornet
1:48:46 Windy Valley
1:50:45 Casinopolis
1:53:59 Icecap
1:56:52 Boss: Knuckles
1:58:35 Boss: Chaos 4
2:02:26 Sky Chase Act 1
2:07:55 Sand Hill
2:13:45 Sky Chase Act 2
2:19:14 Sky Deck
2:22:20 Boss: E-102 γ
2:27:00 Speed Highway
2:29:34 Boss: Egg Walker
2:32:26 Credits: Believe in Myself

2:36:36 KNUCKLES Story Begins
2:39:21 Speed Highway
2:41:25 Casinopolis
2:46:06 Boss: Chaos 2
2:50:14 Red Mountain
2:53:30 Boss: Sonic
2:55:12 Boss: Chaos 4
3:01:36 Lost World
3:10:45 Sky Deck
3:16:03 Boss: Chaos 6
3:20:11 Credits: Unknown from M.E.

3:24:58 AMY Story Begins
3:30:50 Twinkle Park
3:38:55 Hot Shelter
3:53:57 Final Egg
3:59:33 Boss: ZERO
4:02:01 Credits: My Sweet Passion

4:07:23 BIG Story Begins
4:11:27 Twinkle Park
4:14:50 Icecap
4:18:30 Emerald Coast
4:20:53 Hot Shelter
4:28:04 Boss: Chaos 6
4:30:24 Credits: Lazy Days ~Livin’ in Paradise~

4:34:46 E-102 γ Story Begins
4:36:07 Final Egg
4:37:46 Boss: E-101 β
4:40:44 Emerald Coast
4:53:09 Boss: Sonic
4:56:47 Windy Valley
4:59:10 Red Mountain
5:03:19 Hot Shelter
5:08:54 Boss: E-101mkII
5:13:17 Credits: Theme of E-102 γ

5:18:19 SUPER SONIC Story Begins
5:31:59 Boss: Perfect Chaos
5:38:02 Credits: Open Your Heart
